Q_DESC:
A matrix Student shows the number of questions a student answered correct,no attempt and incorrect.Another matrix shows the marks of each section.

The method to award marks is given by :
 Marks = [ 2  0 -1] Correct No attempt Incorrect
Student matrix contains marks of two students in each of them respectively.
Find out the total score of each student .

Input: First two lines contain the student matrix containing marks of 2 students in 3 sections.
third line contains Score matrix
